## DocumentReplica.applyChangePack() method

`applyChangePack` applies the given change pack into this document. 1. Remove local changes applied to server. 2. Update the checkpoint. 3. Do Garbage collection.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
applyChangePack(pack: ChangePack): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  pack | ChangePack | change pack |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
